description:
J.Z. Alone And Uncensored ...
J.Z. has the prettiest blue eyes and smile that melt together to make one creamful image. He's cute, tough, street-smart and at the heart of it all he's just looking for a place to fit in. He's a freak beneath his thuggish outter appearance and when he's not lounging like a fat cat he's freakin' like a wild man in the bedroom. I turn J.Z. loose alone in the bedroom with the camera and he puts on his own little show for us. He's not lacking in creativity either and he definately knows how to pull in his audiance as he licks out his tongue and smiles and he throws his legs in the air and toys with his ass all the while smiling at the camera. He fingers his ass, licks his fingers to do a taste test for the viewer then blows a hot, fat load all over the comforter. I think you'll like J.Z. as much as we do around here.
title: JZ
